ideas.title: Subscription Terminator
ideas.description: A browser extension that generates a virtual card for free trials and automatically cancels it before you get charged. No more accidental $99/year charges.
ideas.author: founder@subterm.io

comments.text: Privacy.com kind of does this but manual.
comments.author: TechWiz@gmail.com
